fields.summary: iOS: add architecture to module not found message

comments.body:
Verified fixed, using:

Titanium SDK 3.5.0.v20150106224118
Studio 3.4.1.201410281743 
Xcode 6.1.1

On: 
iPad mini, iOS 8.1
iPhone 6, iOS 8.2b3
iPhone 4S Sim, iOS 8.1
iPhone 6 Sim, iOS 8.1
This appears to be causing ALOY-1249
